name: Caravan Palace
description: '''Caravan Palace''' is a French [[electro-swing]] band based in [[Paris]]. The band's influences include [[Django Reinhardt]], [[Vitalic]], [[Lionel Hampton]], and [[Daft Punk]]. The band released their debut studio album, ''[[Caravan Palace (album)|Caravan Palace]]'', on the [[Wagram Music|Wagram]] label in October 2008. The record charted in Switzerland, Belgium, and France, where it reached a peak position of number 11.
